name: TraDove
overview: TraDove, an abbreviation of Trade Dove, suggests a dove (or pigeon) bird that transmits trade information. We aim to solve a major business trade problem ignored by major search engines and B2B platforms. That is, help corporate buyers and sellers, large and small, to better find and connect with each other, and to facilitate trading between and among them. And that is our slogan: Find, Connect, and Trade. We are building one of the largest dedicated search engines designed to help corporate buyers find suppliers for the products and services they need. Our networks span both local and global markets. We also help corporate sellers find target buyers for the products and services they supply. With this search engine and platform, we accelerate connect- ions between company buyers and sellers and facilitate trading among them. So go to http://www.tradove.com/ and enjoy. We are glad that we can help.
